where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( SELF.items ) =1 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | ( SIZEOF ( ['SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'VALUE_RANGE']* TYPEOF ( i ) ) =1 ) AND ( i.name = 'ratio value' ) ) ) =1 )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) | pdr. name = 'contact ratio reference' ) ) =1 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) | ( pdr. name = 'contact ratio reference' ) AND ( 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'PHYSICALLY_MODELLED_PRODUCT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( pdr. definition.definition ) ) ) ) =1 )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) ) =1 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( gpa <* USEDIN ( pdr. definition , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'GENERAL_PROPERTY_ASSOCIATION.'+ 'DERIVED_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'GENERAL_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF ( gpa. base_definition ) ) AND ( gpa. base_definition.name ='surface_condition' ) ) ) =1 ) ) =1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( {2<= SIZEOF ( SELF.items ) <=4} ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* items | ( 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i ) ) AND ( i.name IN [ 'measuring method' , 'measuring position' ] ) ) ) + SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* items | ( SIZEOF ( ['SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'VALUE_RANGE']* TYPEOF ( i ) ) =1 ) AND ( i.name IN ['depth' , 'hardness'] ) ) ) = SIZEOF ( SELF.items ) )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | i.name = 'measuring method' ) ) =1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | i.name ='hardness' ) ) =1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | i.name = 'measuring position' ) ) <=1

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | i.name ='depth' ) ) <=1

where.label: WR6
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) ) =1 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( gpa <* USEDIN ( pdr. definition , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'GENERAL_PROPERTY_ASSOCIATION.'+ 'DERIVED_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'GENERAL_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF ( gpa. base_definition ) ) AND ( gpa. base_definition.name ='surface_condition' ) ) ) =1 ) ) =1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | SIZEOF ( ['SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'VALUE_RANGE' , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM']* TYPEOF ( i ) ) <>1 ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i ) ) ) =1 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | ( 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i ) ) AND ( i.name = 'measuring method' ) ) ) =1 )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | SIZEOF ( ['SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'VALUE_RANGE']* TYPEOF ( i ) ) =1 ) ) >0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.'+ 'REP_1' ) ) <=1 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.'+ 'REP_2' ) ) =0 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.'+ 'REP_1' ) | rr. rep_2.name = 'measuring direction' ) ) = SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.'+ 'REP_1' ) ) )

where.label: WR5
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) ) =1 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( gpa <* USEDIN ( pdr. definition , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'GENERAL_PROPERTY_ASSOCIATION.'+ 'DERIVED_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'GENERAL_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF ( gpa. base_definition ) ) AND ( gpa. base_definition.name ='surface_condition' ) ) ) =1 ) ) =1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | SIZEOF ( ['SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'VALUE_RANGE']* TYPEOF ( i ) ) <>1 ) ) =0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | name ='depth' ) ) <=1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) ) =1 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( gpa <* USEDIN ( pdr. definition , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'GENERAL_PROPERTY_ASSOCIATION.'+ 'DERIVED_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'GENERAL_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF ( gpa. base_definition ) ) AND ( gpa. base_definition.name ='surface_condition' ) ) ) =1 ) ) =1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( {2<= SIZEOF ( SELF.items ) <=5} ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* items | ( 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i ) ) AND ( i.name IN [ 'colour id' , 'colour name' , 'lustre' , 'pattern' , 'transparency'] ) ) ) = SIZEOF ( SELF.items ) )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | i.name = 'colour id' ) ) =1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | i.name ='lustre' ) ) =1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | i.name = 'colour name' ) ) <=1

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | i.name ='pattern' ) ) <=1

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* SELF.items | i.name ='transparency' ) ) <=1

where.label: WR7
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) ) =1 ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.'+ 'USED_REPRESENTATION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( gpa <* USEDIN ( pdr. definition , 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+'GENERAL_PROPERTY_ASSOCIATION.'+ 'DERIVED_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.'+ 'GENERAL_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF ( gpa. base_definition ) ) AND ( gpa. base_definition.name ='surface_condition' ) ) ) =1 ) ) =1 )

function.name: surface_condition_correlation

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(pdr <* product_definition_representation | NOT surface_condition_correlation(pdr.definition, pdr.used_representation) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (SIZEOF( QUERY( r <* representation | (r.name = 'treatment result') AND (SIZEOF(r.items) > 2) )) = 0) AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( r <* representation | (r.name = 'treatment result') AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* r.items | NOT ('SURFACE_CONDITIONS_MIM.DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(i)) )) > 0) )) = 0)

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( r <* representation | (r.name = 'treatment result') AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* r.items | i.name = 'result' )) = 0) )) = 0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( r <* representation | (r.name = 'treatment result') AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* r.items | i.name = 'purpose' )) > 1) )) = 0
